definition: Holbrook (name)/Richard C.A. Holbrooke (1941-2010), US diplomat, influential in brokering 1995 Dayton Bosnian peace deal, US special envoy to Afghanistan and Pakistan from 2009
Hormuz, Iran, at the mouth of the Persian Gulf
Hormuz Island, Iran, at the mouth of the Persian Gulf

sentences.english: Lindholm says the study could be interpreted in a couple ways.
sentences.chinese: 林霍尔姆说这个研究可以通过许多方式去阐释。

sentences.english: I was impressed with his skills in the backhand smash, the forehand smash, and the drop shot.
sentences.chinese: 霍尔比较喜欢横拍，因为他可以轻易地用反手扣球。

sentences.english: Death in High Society by Inez Holden.
sentences.chinese: 死在上流社会的两大霍尔登。

sentences.english: I can't sure if you still remember Agent Miriam Holtz.
sentences.chinese: 我不能肯定，如果你还记得代理刘健霍尔茨。

sentences.english: I also asked Jeff to talk to Colonel Holmes.
sentences.chinese: 我也请求杰夫与霍尔姆斯上校谈谈。

sentences.english: The picture shows Horgos Border China-Kiaz Commodity Street. China.
sentences.chinese: 图为中国霍尔果斯口岸中哈商品一条街。

sentences.english: F.C. Hall told Post he could use the plane to enter flight competitions.
sentences.chinese: 霍尔对波斯特说，他可以用这架飞机参加飞行比赛。

sentences.english: What does Horsey think of the Democrats' fascination with Clinton?
sentences.chinese: 霍尔西是如何看待民主党人对克林顿的迷恋呢？

sentences.english: In the end, we find out that Holden is telling his story from the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我们发现这个故事是霍尔顿在医院讲的。

sentences.english: You can't accept sitting in your room,” Halsted said.
sentences.chinese: “你不能接受坐在你的房间里”，霍尔斯特德说。

sentences.english: Dr Hall's model predicts an average loss of just 11kg.
sentences.chinese: 而霍尔博士的模式预测的是，平均减掉11公斤。

sentences.english: Dr Hall's model predicts an average loss of just 11kg.
sentences.chinese: 而霍尔博士的模式预测只能平均减少11公斤。

sentences.english: He doubts there are more than 20 tigers left in Ranthambhore.
sentences.chinese: 他怀疑兰泰姆霍尔的老虎数量仅剩下20多只。

sentences.english: Yes, Holden . That's all it was, some sex.
sentences.chinese: 是的，霍尔登就是这样，有几个。

sentences.english: Imagining anenormous, expensive concrete dam, Hall started to hit Delete.
sentences.chinese: 想像到巨大而昂贵的混凝土水坝，霍尔开始点击删除。

sentences.english: Mr. Ramos-Horta says that international peacekeepers were too slow in their attempts to catch his attackers.
sentences.chinese: 霍尔塔说，国际维和部队追捕袭击者的行动过于缓慢。
